mapper.insert: insert into moments (id, creator_id, creator_nick_name, creator_image, publish_time, type, thumb_number, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatorNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thumbNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, creator_id, creator_nick_name, creator_image, publish_time, type, thumb_number, content from moments
